text: Chukwuedu Nwokolowas born in April, 1927 in a place called Oraifite in Anambra State. He attended Government college at Umuahia at the year 1934 to 1939 and then he got admission to the University of Ibadan for his medical training. He worked with Nigeria civil service as a specialist physician at the year 1956. https://blerf.org/index.php/biography/nwokolo-professor-chukwuedu/ == References == Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Anambra State Category:Nigerian physicians
title: Chukwuedu Nwokolo
